original_title: Turma da Mônica e Os Jovens Titãs em: Videochamada com o Perigo!
overview: In an unexpected crossover, Monica receives a call from Robin, the Boy Wonder, who asks her to handle an emergency. To help him, the short girl calls Maggy, Smudge and Jimmy Five, but while Robin tries to save the world, Limoeiro's gang seems to have fun without taking anything seriously. Short film shown during the first edition of DC Fandome.
tagline: The Young Titans in Action and the gang most loved by Brazilians, Turma da Mônica!
title: Turma da Mônica e Os Jovens Titãs em: Videochamada com o Perigo!
